content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Crude oil mine at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of a pumpjack at position(17.5, 40.5)

### Copper ore mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of an electric mining drill at position(-46.5, 70.5) and an electric furnace at position(-46.5, 73.5)

### Electronic circuit factory at position(-39.5, 70.5)
Consists of an assembling machine at position(-39.5, 70.5)

### Electricity generator at position(3.0, 2.5)
Consists of a boiler at position(3.0, 0.5), a steam engine at position(3.5, 4.5), and pipes connecting them.

### Plastic bar factory at position(20.5, 70.5)
Consists of a chemical plant at position(20.5, 70.5), input inserter at position(18.5, 70.5), and output inserter at position(22.5, 70.5)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities with belts
- Ensure that the target position for the belt is not occupied by another entity.
- Verify that the entities being connected are adjacent to each other or have a clear path for the belt.

### Errors when placing entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that the required entity is available in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when trying to get a resource patch or entity
- Verify that the specified resource or entity exists at the given location before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item.
- Verify that the required crafting machine or furnace is available for the item being crafted.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before using them in the code.

### Errors when placing entities next to each other
- Ensure the target position for the new entity is not occupied by another entity.
- Increase the spacing between entities if they are being placed too close to each other.

### Errors when placing pumpjack at a location
- Ensure the target location is not water or occupied by another entity before placing a pumpjack.

### Errors when attempting to place an entity that already exists
- Check if an entity already exists at the target position before attempting to place a new one.

### Errors due to typos or undefined names
- Verify that all names and variables are correctly spelled and defined.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace without having the required items in inventory
- Ensure that the required items are available in the inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### Errors when attempting to craft an item without the required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when getting an entity that does not exist at a specified position
- Verify that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when placing entities too far away from the player position
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities on water or invalid terrain
- Ensure the target location is valid for the entity being placed.

### Errors when entities are not receiving electricity
- Ensure that the entities are connected to a power source and that the power source is functioning.

### Errors when chemical plant is not producing due to missing resources
- Ensure that the required resources (e.g., coal, petroleum-gas) are available for the chemical plant to produce plastic bars.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
